// Losowo wybierz 15 zapytań na tę sesję (zwiększone z 5)
const shuffled = searchQueries.sort(() => 0.5 - Math.random());
const selectedQueries = shuffled.slice(0, 15);

console.log(`Wybrano ${selectedQueries.length} zapytań z ${searchQueries.length} dostępnych`);

return selectedQueries.map(query => ({ searchQuery: query }));

parameters.query: INSERT INTO leads (email, phones, websites, source, source_query, facility_type, found_at, status) VALUES ('{{ $json.email }}', '{{ $json.phones }}', '{{ $json.websites }}', '{{ $json.source }}', '{{ $json.sourceQuery }}', '{{ $json.facilityType }}', '{{ $json.foundAt }}', '{{ $json.status }}') ON CONFLICT (email) DO UPDATE SET facility_type = EXCLUDED.facility_type, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING *;
